pousada.title: The Guesthouse
pousada.desc: The guesthouse is located in a quiet area of Jericoacoara, just 500m (1/3mi) from the Main Street and 1km (1/2mi) from the beach. It has two types of accommodation: a 120m¬≤ (1300 ft¬≤) house, 3 bedrooms including a suite, 2 shared bathrooms, a complete living room and kitchen, and a small barbecue area. All rooms have air conditioning and there is free Wifi available. Besides the house, there are other 3 independent suites for up to 2 people, with private bathroom, balcony, air conditioning, minibar, TV and Wi-Fi. To make your experience even more remarkable, the Vila has a beautiful terrace overlooking Jericoacoara's beach.

acom.title: Accommodations

acom.desc3: 3 private suites for 2 people, with bathroom, air conditioning, TV and minibar.

avila.title: Jericoacoara
avila.desc: The name 'Jericoaquara' comes from the Tupi language and means 'lair of the turtles'. Jeri still maintains its simplicity, as the streets are made of sand and there are no street lights. Some attractions of Jeri are:
avila.horses: Quad bike rides on Mangue Seco beach
avila.arrive: Jeri is 300km from Fortaleza and there are several transfer options to get to the village, such as: private or shared 4WD and even a bus. Jeri now also has its own airport - JJD, located just 30 minutes from the village. To access the village, a Tourism Fee of R$ 41,50 is charged per visitor for a stay of up to 10 days.
